ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: Kiting is where they use SOW or jboots or other speed things, then slap a DOT on a big guy then run like hell, stop, slap a DOT, run.. etc..  Most people mean
ygData.messageBody:
Kiting is where they use SOW or jboots or other speed things, then slap a
DOT on a big guy then run like hell, stop, slap a DOT, run.. etc.. Most
people mean twinking as in a high level character either a.) helps another
person kill something or b.) gives them high level equipment.
Allsar Olath`Vlos - 26th level - Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Azor <jmaynus@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, July 10, 1999 10:37 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire


>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
>Questions what is kiting, I have never ever heard of it. Twinking? You
>mean as in giving one character things from your other? I got rid of all
my
>characters but Azor, didn't see the point anymore, just wanted to get him
>built up. If you have more then one it's hard to get them up in Lvls in a
>way cause one day you're playing this one the next its that one.
>
>**************************
>Azor
>Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
>**************************
>
>> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>>
>> not true...druids can solo yellows...and reds sometimes...if they have
the
>> mana to....kiting is interesting...messed with it tonight....would've
>killed
>> a yellow solo, but didn't have the mana for it...gotta do some twinking
>and
>> find some spare wis items hehehe (;
>>
>> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
>> lv 40 human <blind as a bat> cleric of The Rathe
>>

>>

>> >

>> > sword when we have our undead spells. No other class can truely solo
